channel.title: [317] RuneCosmic Development Thread [317]
channel.description:
Welcome to RuneCosmic, a new RuneScape private server that will exceed any other of its time. The base we will be using is RuneFusion.
[center][u][b]Source Developers[/b][/u] The Soul Xx qwertyuiop xX Jc22493 Si Force PrimaDude Anthony[/center]
[center][u][b]Client Developers[/b][/u] I PK Pigeons[/center]
[center][u][b]Side Developers (You cannot apply; they are pre-picked.)[/b][/u] Slave Scyth [MySQL][/center]
[center][b][u]Pictures of Server[/u][/b]
[b][u]Pictures of Client[/u][/b]
[b]Perfect pickup; no more dots[/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2czq5wg.png[/img]
[b]Noted items appear correctly[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/4j9tzp.png[/img]
[b]Special Bar[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/efp72e.png[/img]
[b]Equipment and bonuses screen[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/165s8n.png[/img]
[b]Item stacking and model changing[/b] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/210j60l.gif[/img]
[b]474 themed[/b] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ib27es.png[/img]
[b]Infinity symbol[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/rhvgip.png[/img]
[b]New RuneScape items[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/nnv68m.png[/img]
NOTE: I PK Pigeons has given credits to some people in his update logs. Just look through the pages of the thread.
[b]TeleNubby has approved this development thread. Just read the post right under mine.[/b][/center]

item.title: [317] RuneCosmic Development Thread [317]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:141, topic:274524”]I know I’ve not posted any updates in a while, that’s because I’ve had problems with my internet (At my friends atm)
Might be a couple of weeks til my internet is fixed.

The 503+ version of the client (Renamed one) is going well, I’ve got the gameframe loading and all in the correct places etc. I have the orbs, I just need the refilling and crap.
Can’t post any pictures, this isn’t my computer.

Btw Jc delete the 5th picture please.[/quote]
The item stacking one?

Cuban0 Ftw:

This looks like it’s going to be incredible with your team working on it. Is this going to be a release or hosted?

Not sure yet.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] RuneCosmic Development Thread [317]
item.dc:creator: @J0o_2pac J0o 2pac
item.description:
@J0o_2pac wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:134, topic:274524”][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=362695.msg2782325#msg2782325 date=1242141937]

I hope this all isn’t being ‘hard-coded’

No the sprites are loaded from the cache, I’m currently working on adding items in through the cache.
The efficiency of Toms tool isn’t great though, so it’s taking some time.
The models aren’t overwrote in anyway, so they’re not damaging the cache.
I’m keeping the hardcoding to a minimum

What do you mean by ‘hard-coded’?

I PK Pigeons is hardcoding everything…

Gtfo pls, I spent 2 hours adding over 100 of the items into the cache last night -.-
Even if I did Hard code it all, do a better job please?
I’m actually doing something, and I’ve yet to see anything from the server development yet. So until then don’t make comments like that.

Actually you know what, fuck it. I won’t do anything else until something on the server is done.
[/quote]

It wasn’t suppose to be offensive; and I was just telling Jason what Scarecrows ment by ‘hardcoding everything’.[/quote] You get moody after hard work :\

Read full topic

The efficiency of Toms tool isn’t great though, so it’s taking some time.
The models aren’t overwrote in anyway, so they’re not damaging the cache.
I’m keeping the hardcoding to a minimum

Even if I did Hard code it all, do a better job please?
I’m actually doing something, and I’ve yet to see anything from the server development yet. So until then don’t make comments like that.

Actually you know what, fuck it. I won’t do anything else until something on the server is done.[/quote]

It wasn’t suppose to be offensive; and I was just telling Jason what Scarecrows meant by ‘hardcoding everything’.

I hope this all isn’t being ‘hard-coded’

No the sprites are loaded from the cache, I’m currently working on adding items in through the cache.
The efficiency of Toms tool isn’t great though, so it’s taking some time.
